message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its potential benefits for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product can make a significant difference for you. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,200 for the product.
